entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries. Snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 30 January 2023
